name: Surveys App
what: A web application for creating and managing surveys.
why: This project was created to provide businesses with a simple and intuitive tool for gathering customer feedback.
how: The frontend was built with React and the backend was built with Node.js and MongoDB.

name: Wellhall Hotel Website
what: A website for the fictional Wellhall Hotel.
why: This project was created as a mean to showcase my skills as a web developer and to practice designing and building websites as a whole.
how: The website was built with React and Typescript. Deployed in Github Pages.

name: Lucky Bakery
what: A static website for Lucky Bakery
why: Lucky Bakery is a small business that needed an online presence to showcase their products to potential customers.
how: The website was designed in Figma, built with Typescript and Next JS

name: Papeleria Juliana
what: A responsive web application for a small stationery store chain in Matamoros, Tamaulipas.
why: This project was created to provide the store with an online platform to keep track of their inventory and manage their sales.
how: The website was built with Next.js and Supabase.

name: My Portfolio
what: A responsive web developer portfolio to easily update and showcase my projects.
why: I wanted to showcase part of my personality in a project, and what better way than to create a portfolio that reflects my style and interests
how: The app was built with Next.js using Javascript, styled in Tailwind CSS and deployed in Vercel.
